001package com.fns.xlator.cache;
002
003import org.springframework.boot.actuate.cache.DefaultCacheStatistics;
004import org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics.Metric;
005import org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics.dropwizard.DropwizardMetricServices;
006import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnection;
007import org.springframework.data.redis.connection.RedisConnectionFactory;
008import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisConnectionUtils;
009import org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.Scheduled;
010
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Properties;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014
015public class RedisCacheMonitor {
016
017    private final RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory;
018    private final DropwizardMetricServices metricServices;
019
020    public RedisCacheMonitor(RedisConnectionFactory redisConnectionFactory, DropwizardMetricServices metricServices) {
021        this.redisConnectionFactory = redisConnectionFactory;
022        this.metricServices = metricServices;
023    }
024
025    @Scheduled(fixedDelay = 5000)
026    public void monitor() {
027        DefaultCacheStatistics statistics = new DefaultCacheStatistics();
028        // @see http://redis.io/commands/INFO
029        RedisConnection connection = RedisConnectionUtils.getConnection(this.redisConnectionFactory);
030        try {
031            Properties props = connection.info();
032            Long hitCount = Long.parseLong(props.getProperty("keyspace_hits"));
033            Long missCount = Long.parseLong(props.getProperty("keyspace_misses"));
034            statistics.setGetCacheCounts(hitCount, missCount);
035            // we do not currently have a way of calculating the cache size, so we have to filter
036            List<Metric<?>> metrics = statistics
037                                        .toMetrics("cache.")
038                                            .stream()
039                                                .filter(f -> !f.getName().contains(".size"))
040                                                .collect(Collectors.toList());
041            metrics.forEach(m -> metricServices.submit(m.getName(), (Double) m.getValue()));
042        } finally {
043            RedisConnectionUtils.releaseConnection(connection, this.redisConnectionFactory);
044        }
045    }
046}
